title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Virtual World-Based Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Basic Digital Educational Tools and Understanding of Elementary Language Curriculum
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can independently design virtual world-based language lessons by applying the i-MMOLE framework
Participants can creatively plan three or more types of virtual world activities implementable in smartphone environments
Participants can revise and improve virtual world lesson designs based on peer feedback and submit final deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
